assignments.name: approved_date

string.name: status
string.value: Não é evento relacionado à venda

parameters.query:
SELECT COUNT(id) AS qt
FROM execution_entity
WHERE "workflowId" = '{{$workflow.id}}'
 AND "status" IN ('running', 'queued', 'new', 'waiting')  
 AND "id" <> {{ $execution.id }} 
AND finished = false
